snippet: Roger Goodell will not be returning the draft picks stripped from the New England Patriots for the use of deflated footballs in the 2014 AFC championship game....
lead_paragraph: Roger Goodell will not be returning the draft picks stripped from the New England Patriots for the use of deflated footballs in the 2014 AFC championship game.

headline.main: Goodell: Patriots Won't Get 'Deflategate' Draft Picks Back
headline.print_headline: Goodell: Patriots Won't Get 'Deflategate' Draft Picks Back
